featured.text: When the deer hear a combination of a 3-second- long recording of a deer’s snort and 20 seconds of a barking dog, they panic and flee rapidly.
RTRI officials explain that deer have a habit of repeatedly snorting short, shrill sounds to alert other deer when they perceive danger.
In Blixen’s words, “their weapons and finery are as much a part of their being as are a stag’s antlers” (a male deer’s horns).
Deer are attracted to railway lines because of a need for iron in their diets.

other.text: A combination of sound and visual devices attracts more deer to the tracks.
This dietary need has led to a constant battle to keep the deer separate from the unforgiving nature of tons of onrushing rolling stock.
Future plans include static barking sites where deer are commonly seen, but “the noises will not be blared in areas where people live beside the tracks.” 53.
In the past, flashing red lights and even lion faces have been unsuccessfully trialed in an attempt to keep deer off the tracks.
The country has been troubled by a problem with trains colliding with deer on its railways.
Why are deer attracted to train tracks?
The battle between deer and other animals.
To explain how Maasai warriors hunt for deer in the wild.
RTRI researchers say late-night tests, at times when deer are most frequently seen by railway tracks, have resulted in a 45 percent reduction of deer sighting.
Which of the following is true about the deer issue discussed in the passage? (A) RTRI’s new invention prompts deer to run away.
The barking of the hound, which drives deer to panic, strengthens the effect of the warning noise, according to the RTRI.
According to Japan’s transport ministry, there were 613 cases of train services suspended or delayed for at least 30 minutes resulting from collisions with deer and other wild animals in 2016-17.

definition.zh_def: 鹿，一種草食性動物，通常有分叉的角，生活在森林和草原中。
definition.en_def: A deer is a herbivorous animal, typically characterized by antlers, found in forests and grasslands.
definition.example: The deer gracefully leaped over the fallen log in the forest.
